title: horseball_inn
subheader: You see a large, lumpy black boulder sitting on the grass just beneath a large shaded tree. Upon getting closer, you can see that the boulder is moving and jostling slightly, and looks oddly glossy. Finally when you get close enough, you discover it's not a boulder at all. Two muscular, powerful horse legs are on either side of it, and behind it, resting under the tree, is a massive, chubby black stallion. What you thought was a boulder is in fact his massively stretched out, sweaty black ballsack.

events.title: Ask What's Going On
events.subtitle: The horse seems perfectly content with his disproportionately enormous balls. He's lying on the grass, his arms behind his back, while he watches the clouds.

fail.text:

He yawns, and chews on a long piece of grass. "Anyhow, if you want a room, it's only five guilders a night. Just hand me the cash and crawl on in. Don't worry, the "entrance" will help you on the way."

events.title: Stay at the Horseball Inn
events.subtitle: For five coins, you can spend the night sleeping curled up in one of the horse's huge, musky balls. If that sort of thing appeals to you.
